languages.text: "Ты говоришь об {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Адептус Министорум{/g}? Что же, эти глашатаи слова Его имеют большую силу. Всякий священник — и я в том числе — состоит в их иерархии, и Экклезиархии доверено особое право судить, что благочестиво, а что скверно. Адептус Министорум молятся и заботятся о храмах, рассылают миссии, подобные моей, во все концы царства людей, сражаются с ересями".

traits.locale_text: "Ты говоришь об Адептус Министорум? Что же, эти глашатаи слова Его имеют большую силу. Всякий священник — и я в том числе — состоит в их иерархии, и Экклезиархии доверено особое право судить, что благочестиво, а что скверно. Адептус Министорум молятся и заботятся о храмах, рассылают миссии, подобные моей, во все концы царства людей, сражаются с ересями".

languages.text: "You speak of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, is part of its hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum prays and cares for the temples, it sends missions such as my own to every corner of the dominion of Humanity, it fights against heresies."
languages.original_text: "Ты говоришь об {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Адептус Министорум{/g}? Что же, эти глашатаи слова Его имеют большую силу. Всякий священник — и я в том числе — состоит в их иерархии, и Экклезиархии доверено особое право судить, что благочестиво, а что скверно. Адептус Министорум молятся и заботятся о храмах, рассылают миссии, подобные моей, во все концы царства людей, сражаются с ересями".

traits.locale_text: "You speak of the Adeptus Ministorum? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, are part of their hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum pray and care for the temples, they send missions such as my own to every corner of the realm of man, they fight heresies."

"You speak of the Adeptus Ministorum? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, are part of their hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum pray and care for the temples, they send missions such as my own to every corner of the realm of man, they fight heresies."

"You speak of the Adeptus Ministorum? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, is part of its hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum prays and cares for the temples, it sends missions such as my own to every corner of the realm of Humanity, it fights against heresies."

"You speak of the Adeptus Ministorum? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, is part of its hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum prays and cares for the temples, it sends missions such as my own to every corner of the realm of Humanity, it fights against heresies."

"You speak of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, is part of its hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum prays and cares for the temples, it sends missions such as my own to every corner of the dominion of Humanity, it fights against heresies."

languages.text: “你指的是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教教会{/g}吗？这么说吧，这些人都负责传达祂的话语，拥有巨大的权力。每位牧师，包括我在内，都是国教的一部分。国教拥有独一无二的权力，有权判断什么是善，什么是恶。国教教会负责祈祷，也负责照顾各地的神殿。它负责在人类领域的各个角落设置布道所，与异端邪说作斗争。我的布道所就是其中之一。”
languages.original_text: "You speak of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, is part of its hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum prays and cares for the temples, it sends missions such as my own to every corner of the dominion of Humanity, it fights against heresies."

traits.locale_text: “你指的是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教教会{/g}吗？这么说吧，这些人都负责传达祂的话语，拥有巨大的权力。每位牧师，包括我在内，都是国教的一部分。国教拥有独一无二的权力，用来判断什么是善，什么是恶。国教教会负责祈祷，也负责照顾各地的神殿。它负责在人类领域的各个角落设置布道所，与异端邪说作斗争。我的布道所就是其中之一。”

languages.text: «¿Se refiere al {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Los heraldos de Su palabra tienen un gran poder. Todos los sacerdotes, yo incluido, formamos parte de esta jerarquía, y la Eclesiarquía posee el derecho único de juzgar lo que es virtuoso y lo que es maligno. El Adeptus Ministorum reza y vela por los templos, encomienda misiones como la mía a todos los confines del dominio de la Humanidad y se enfrenta a las herejías».
languages.original_text: "You speak of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, is part of its hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum prays and cares for the temples, it sends missions such as my own to every corner of the dominion of Humanity, it fights against heresies."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se refiere al {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Los heraldos de Su palabra tienen un gran poder. Todos los sacerdotes, yo incluido, formamos parte de esta jerarquía, y la Eclesiarquía posee el derecho único de juzgar lo que es virtuoso y lo que es maligno. El Adeptus Ministorum reza y vela por los templos, encomienda misiones como la mía a todos los confines del reino de la Humanidad y se enfrenta a las herejías».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国宗務局{/g}のことでしょうか？皇帝の言葉を伝える者たちで、大きな力を持っています。私を含め、すべての司祭はその階層に属しており、帝国聖教会は何が高潔で何が悪意あるものかを判断する唯一無二の権利を有するのです。帝国宗務局は神殿のために祈り、尽くし、私のような伝道師を人類が支配するあらゆる領域にまで派遣し、異端と戦います」
languages.original_text: "You speak of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, is part of its hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum prays and cares for the temples, it sends missions such as my own to every corner of the dominion of Humanity, it fights against heresies."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国宗務局{/g}のことでしょうか？皇帝の言葉を伝える者たちで、大きな力を持っています。私を含め、すべての司祭はその階層に属しており、帝国聖教会は何が高潔で何が悪意あるものかを判断する唯一無二の権利を有するのです。帝国宗務局は神殿のために祈り、尽くし、私のような伝道師を人類が支配するあらゆる領域にまで派遣し、異端と戦います」

languages.text: "Meint Ihr das {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Nun, diese Herolde seines Worts verfügen über große Macht. Jeder Priester, mich eingeschlossen, ist Teil dieser Hierarchie, und die Ekklesiarchie besitzt das einzigartige Recht, darüber zu urteilen, was tugendhaft ist und was bösartig. Das Adeptus Ministorum betet und kümmert sich um die Tempel, es entsendet Missionen wie die meine in jede Ecke des Menschenreichs, und es bekämpft die Ketzerei."
languages.original_text: "You speak of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, is part of its hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum prays and cares for the temples, it sends missions such as my own to every corner of the dominion of Humanity, it fights against heresies."

traits.locale_text: "Meint Ihr das {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Nun, diese Herolde seines Worts verfügen über große Macht. Jeder Priester, mich eingeschlossen, ist Teil dieser Hierarchie, und die Ekklesiarchie besitzt das einzigartige Recht, darüber zu urteilen, was tugendhaft ist und was bösartig. Das Adeptus Ministorum betet und kümmert sich um die Tempel, es entsendet Missionen wie die meine in jede Ecke des Menschenreichs, und es bekämpft die Ketzerei."

languages.text: « L'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}, vous voulez dire ? Eh bien, ces porteurs de Sa parole ont un grand pouvoir. Chaque prêtre, dont moi-même, fait partie de cette hiérarchie, et seule l'Ecclésiarchie a le droit de juger ce qui est vertueux et ce qui est mauvais. L'Adeptus Ministorum prie et entretient les temples, envoie des missions comme la mienne dans tous les recoins de l'humanité, et combat les hérétiques. »
languages.original_text: "You speak of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, is part of its hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum prays and cares for the temples, it sends missions such as my own to every corner of the dominion of Humanity, it fights against heresies."

traits.locale_text: « L'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}, vous voulez dire ? Eh bien, ces porteurs de Sa parole ont un grand pouvoir. Chaque prêtre, dont moi-même, fait partie de cette hiérarchie, et seule l'Ecclésiarchie a le droit de juger ce qui est vertueux et ce qui est mauvais. L'Adeptus Ministorum prie et entretient les temples, envoie des missions comme la mienne dans tous les recoins de l'humanité, et combat les hérétiques. »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum'u{/g} kastediyorsun galiba. İmparator kelamını yayan o elçilerin gücü büyüktür. Ben dâhil her rahip, o hiyerarşinin parçasıdır ve neyin sevap neyin günah olduğuna karar verme hakkı yalnız Ekleşiarşi'ye aittir. Adeptus Ministorum, tapınaklar için dua eder ve buraların bakımını yapar; benim gibi misyonerleri İnsanlığın diyarının uzak köşelerine gönderir; kâfirliklere karşı savaşır."
languages.original_text: "You speak of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}? Well, these heralds of His word hold great power. Every priest, myself included, is part of its hierarchy, and the Ecclesiarchy possesses the unique right to judge what is virtuous and what is malign. The Adeptus Ministorum prays and cares for the temples, it sends missions such as my own to every corner of the dominion of Humanity, it fights against heresies."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}'dan bahsediyorsun sanırım? O'nun kelâmını yayan öncülerin gücü büyüktür. Ben dâhil her bir rahip hiyerarşinin bir parçasıdır ve Ekleşiarşi'nin özel bir neyin sevap neyin günah olduğuna karar verme hakkı bulunur. Adeptus Ministorum, tapınaklar için dua eder ve buraların bakımını yapar, benim gibileri İnsanlığın diyarının uzak köşelerine görevlere gönderir, kâfirliklere karşı savaşır."
